stripped_text: While the Runner is accessing this asset in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this asset anywhere except in Archives, you may pay 4 credits. If you do, give the Runner 1 tag and do 3 net damage.
text:
While the Runner is accessing this asset in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this asset anywhere except in Archives, you may pay 4[credit]. If you do, give the Runner 1 tag and do 3 net damage.
title: Snare!
